JavaScript the Definitive Guide Reading Introduction to JavaScript

Chapter 1, Introduction to JavaScript

HTML to specify the content of web pages, css to specify the presentation of web pages, and JavaScript to specify the behavior of web pages.

High-level, dynamic, untyped interpreted(解释). Well-suited to object-oriented and functional programming styles.

Minimal built-in API for working with text, arrays, dates, and regular expressions but does not include any input or output functionality. I, O are the responsibility of the "host environment", usually web browser.

1.1 Core JavaScript

blablabla…

JavaScript is object-oriented, but it is quite different than most. Here show how to create class to represent 2D geometric points.

 1     // Define a construtor function to initialize a new Point object
 2  function Point(x, y) {      // by convention, constructors start with capitals
 3      this.x = x;             // this keyword is the new object being init
 4      this.y = y;             
 5  }                            // no return is necessary
 6 
 7  // Use a constructor function with the keyword "new" to create instances
 8  var p = new Point(1, 1);
 9 
10  // Define methods for Point objects by assigning them to the prototype
11  // object associated with constructor function.
12  Point.prototype.r = function () {
13      return Math.sqrt(this.x * this.x + this.y + this.y);
14  };
15 
16  // Now instances of Point object inherits the method r()
17  console.log(p.r());
18
